thread.section_title: Homeadvisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homeadvisor | www.homeadvisor.com
thread.title: Bill Thomas

author: Bill Thomas
title: Bill Thomas
text: I did not realize, when I went on the site for the first time, that the drill-down questionnaire and the details of the work I wanted done would trigger contractors to call me. While I chose one of the contractors who did contact me, I was surprised that there was not any notification on the Home Advisor web site that I would receive calls as soon as I completed the "survey" of the type of work I wanted done. I would expect to have a step in the process where I acknowledge that I will be called and accept or decline.
